title.narrative: Economic Innovation Partnership Program (EIPP) with Uzbekistan

description.narrative: 1. (20/21 EIPP) Establishment of Master Plan for the smart Water City and Resource circulation in Angren city of the Republic of Uzbekistan 2. (20/21 EIPP) Establishment of the National Big Data Strategy for Uzbekistan 3. (20/21 EIPP) Establishment of the Master Plan for National Smart Logistics for Uzbekistan 4. (20/21 EIPP) Establishment of the National Strategy for Solar Energy Industry 5. (20/21 EIPP) Establishment of the Master Plan for the Uzbekistan Construction and Agricultural Machinery Industry Cluster Development Policy

participating-org.narrative: The Export-Import Bank of Korea(Economic Development Cooperation Fund)
